successes.title: The Ice Chest: Makes Crystal Clear Ice Cubes or Spheres
successes.description: The easiest way to make four large crystal-clear slow-melting ice cubes or spheres for cocktails in your home freezer with tap water

Pledges.description:
First 500: Special price for our early supporters
(Future retail price: $120). Receive (1) Ice Chest. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping.

Special price for Kickstarter backers
(Future retail price: $120). Receive (1) Ice Chest. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping.
The Connoisseur: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $132). Receive (1) Ice Chest + (1) Ice Ball Tube for storage. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping.

The Connoisseur: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $132). Receive (1) Ice Chest + (1) Ice Ball Tube for storage. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping. Updated delivery date from previous Connoisseur bundle - both will deliver Dec '14.

Ice Chest w/ both molds: Special price for Kickstarter backers (Future retail price: $160). Receive (1) Ice Chest with both the Clear Spheres and Clear Cubes molds. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping.

The Connoisseur II: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $172). Receive (1) Ice Chest (w/ Clear Spheres & Clear Cubes molds) + (1) Ice Ball Tube for storage. Free US shipping, please add $25 for international shipping.
The Entertainer: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $264). Receive (2) Ice Chests + (2) Ice Ball Tubes for storage. Free US shipping, please add $40 for international shipping.

The Entertainer II: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $344). Receive (2) Ice Chests (w/ two Clear Spheres & two Clear Cubes molds) + (2) Ice Ball Tubes for storage. Free US shipping, please add $50 for international shipping.
The Barkeep: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $660). Receive (5) Ice Chests + (5) Ice Ball Tubes for storage. Free US shipping, please add $75 for international shipping.

The Barkeep II: Special bundle for Kickstarter backers (retail value: $860). Receive (5) Ice Chests (w/ five Clear Spheres & five Clear Cubes molds) + (5) Ice Ball Tubes for storage. Free US shipping, please add $85 for international shipping.
